name: Oatmeal Raisins Cookie

attributes.title: Ingredients
attributes.details: Organic oatmeal, organic rolled oats, butter, brown sugar, salt, free-range eggs, and raisins.

attributes.title: Allergy Info
attributes.details: This product contains eggs. It may also contain traces of gluten and nuts.

attributes.title: Shelf-life and Storage
attributes.details: Enjoy cold or at room temperature | Keep at room temperature in a sealed jar for up to 1 week | For long-term storage, place in zip-lock bags and keep in the freezer for up to 3 months | Cookies must not be refrigerated | To serve from freezer, allow cookies to thaw at room temp. and then refresh in 180c oven, or toast it right away

attributes.title: Delivery
attributes.details: Sourdough bakery delivers Monday through Saturday of each week upon pre-order with ETA of 2 working days.

description: Oatmeal raisin cookie is a delightful treat with an irresistible aroma. Earthy and humble, this classic American cookie demands a glass of milk as accompaniment.
